title: Issue a Request for Information List
description: At the start of fieldwork, an auditor sends a formal request list (sometimes called a PBC list) to the auditee.

tasks.description: Based on the audit plan, create a detailed list of all documents and data needed from the auditee.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive 'Provided by Client' (PBC) list is drafted.

tasks.description: Send the PBC list to the primary audit contact for the business unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditee receives the formal request list.

tasks.description: Track the status of each requested item in a tracking log, following up on overdue items.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor actively manages the collection of evidence against the request list.
